description: Gets free trial status for multiple Amazon Web Services accounts.

nested_items.name: accounts
nested_items.description: An array of objects that provide Amazon Inspector free trial details for each of the requested accounts.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The account associated with the Amazon Inspector free trial information.

nested_items.name: freeTrialInfo
nested_items.description: Contains information about the Amazon Inspector free trial for an account.

nested_items.name: end
nested_items.description: The date and time that the Amazon Inspector free trail ends for a given account.

nested_items.name: start
nested_items.description: The date and time that the Amazon Inspector free trail started for a given account.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The order to sort results by.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of scan covered by the Amazon Inspector free trail.

nested_items.name: failedAccounts
nested_items.description: An array of objects detailing any accounts that free trial data could not be returned for.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The account associated with the Amazon Inspector free trial information.
